text: kisima viśvāsavantayeku ghātanaya kirīma kisima viśvāsavantayekuṭa sudusu næta; væradīmakin misa. (obagen) kavurun hō yamkisi viśvāsavantayekuva ghātanaya kara dæmuvahot (eyaṭa vandi vaśayen) viśvāsavanta ek vahaleku nidahas kaḷa yutuya. ē samagama maraṇayaṭa pat vūvāgē pavulē udaviya (samāva dī) dayābarava athæra dæmuvahot misa, eyaṭa sarilana vandi mudalakda ovun veta geviya yutuya. (meyaṭa) ohu, obagē saturu gōtrikayin vaśayen siṭa, viśvāsavantayeku vaśayenut siṭiyahot, viśvāsavantayeku vana vahaleku nidahas kaḷahot pramāṇavatya. (vandi gevīmaṭa avaśyaya næta. meyaṭa) ohu oba samaga givisum kara gat gōtrikayingen siṭinneku vaśayen siṭiyahot ohugē pavulē udaviyaṭa vandi mudala geviya yutu atara viśvāsavantayeku vana ek vahaleku nidahasda kaḷa yutuya. (mesē vandi vaśayen geviya yutu mudala) kavurun hō at kara nogatahot ohu allāh veta (tama varadaṭa) samāva illā māsa dekak nokaḍavā upavāsayē yediya yutuya. allāh hon̆din danneku hā gnānavantayeku vaśayen siṭinnēya
